title: Treasure Field
paragraph: A treasure field will grant a randomly selected reward from the currently active treasure reward table to the player who owns the field at the point of time when the treasure-timer reaches 0. After the countdown ended and rewards were given, the countdown refreshes and starts counting down again.

chapters.subtitle: Treasure Field Rarity-Level
chapters.paragraph:
Treasure fields exist in 3 different rarity types:
  • Level 1 - Common
  • Level 2 - Magic
  • Level 3 - Divine
The rewards gained from the treasure field become more valuable as the rarity-level increases.

chapters.subtitle: Treasure Timer Interval
chapters.paragraph:
The treasure timer interval specifies the time that the countdown refreshes to after treasure-rewards have been handed out. 

 For worlds running with default settings, this treasure timer interval is set to 4 hours. This means that, within a day of 24 hours, the owner of a treasure field will receive exactly 6 rewards. 
 Also, because of the fact that 24 can be divided by 4 with no remainder left, this means that the treasure reward handout will always happen at the same 6 points of time each day.

chapters.subtitle: What can I do on this field?
chapters.paragraph:
• Unit Recruiting: No
  • Soul Stone Production: Yes
  • Local Skill Tree: No
